54.eng-name: The Book of Tribulations and Portents of the Last Hour

hadiths.text: Abu Bakra reported Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) as saying:When two Muslims (confront each other) and the one amongst them attacks his brother with a weapon, both of them are at the brink of Hell-Fire. And when one of them kills his companion, both of them get into Hell-Fire

chapter.eng-name: If Two Muslims Confront One Another With Their Swords
